nasa_technology1839292199579603438.content: Researchers are working on an idea that may vastly improve how we build in space. Launching large objects to orbit today is limited by rocket size/cargo capacity. The Bend-Forming process may beat these limitations and transform in-space construction.
nasa_technology1839292199579603438.author: nasa_technology
